content.query:
USE [FADB];
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.EOSWeatherCleansed2
WITH(
	LOCATION = 'datasourcefilesystem001/Cleansed/EOS/',
	DATA_SOURCE = [datasourcefilesystem001_datasourceaccount001_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
)
AS
SELECT * FROM
(

with cleansed as (
SELECT 
YEAR(Raw.Date) as Year,
MONTH(Raw.Date) as Month,
DAY(Raw.Date) as Day,
round((Raw.MaxTemp + Raw.MinTemp)/2,2) as AvgTemp,
CASE WHEN MONTH(Raw.Date) in (4,5,6,7,8,9,10) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsGrowingSeason,
CASE WHEN (MONTH(Raw.Date) in (4,5,6,7,8,9,10)) AND ((Raw.MaxTemp + Raw.MinTemp)/2 >= 3) 
THEN round((Raw.MaxTemp + Raw.MinTemp)/2,2) -3 ELSE 0 END AS GDD3,
CASE WHEN (MONTH(Raw.Date) in (4,5,6,7,8,9,10)) AND ((Raw.MaxTemp + Raw.MinTemp)/2 >= 10) 
THEN round((Raw.MaxTemp + Raw.MinTemp)/2,2) -10 ELSE 0 END AS GDD10,
Raw.*

FROM( 
SELECT 
cast(SL.Date as date) as Date,
cast(SL.MaxDeg as decimal(4,2)) as MaxTemp,
cast(SL.MinDeg as decimal(4,2)) as MinTemp,
SL.SurfaceSoilMoisture  as SurfaceSoilMoisture,
SL.RootzoneSoilMoisture as RootzoneSoilMoisture,
cast(SL.WindSpeed as decimal(4,2)) as WindSpeed,
cast(SL.Humidity as decimal(4,2)) as Humidity,
cast(SL.Precipitation as decimal(5,2)) as Precipitation,
cast(SL.HeatStress as INT) as HeatStress,
cast(SL.ColdStress as INT) as ColdStress,
'SummerlandEasteVineyard' as location

FROM 
OPENROWSET(
BULK 'https://datasourceaccount001.dfs.core.windows.net/datasourcefilesystem001/DataSource/EOS/WeatherData/*.csv',
FORMAT = 'CSV',
PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as SL)as Raw
),
CUMData as(
SELECT 
T1.Date,
T1.LOCATION,
sum(T2.GDD10) as CUMGDD10, 
sum(T2.GDD3) as CUMGDD3
FROM Cleansed T1
INNER JOIN Cleansed T2 ON T1.Location = T2.Location AND T1.Date >= T2.Date
GROUP BY T1.Date, T1.LOCATION
)

-- CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.EOSWeatherCleansed2
-- WITH(
-- 	LOCATION = 'datasourcefilesystem001/Cleansed/EOS/',
-- 	DATA_SOURCE = [datasourcefilesystem001_datasourceaccount001_dfs_core_windows_net],
-- 	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
-- )
-- AS
SELECT Final.* 
FROM
(
SELECT 
CD.*,
CA.CUMGDD3,
CA.CUMGDD10,
CASE WHEN CA.CUMGDD10 <= 20 THEN 'OffSeason'
    WHEN CA.CUMGDD10 > 20 AND CA.CUMGDD10 <= 254 THEN 'BudBreak'
	WHEN CA.CUMGDD10 > 254 AND CA.CUMGDD10 <= 680 THEN 'Flowering'
	WHEN CA.CUMGDD10 > 680 AND CA.CUMGDD10 <= 1000 THEN 'Berrying'
	WHEN CA.CUMGDD10 > 1000 AND CD.Month <= 10 THEN 'Havesting'
	ELSE 'OffSeason' END AS GrowthStage,
CASE WHEN CD.IsGrowingSeason = 1 THEN ROUND(1.0755* POWER((1+(EXP(-0.0042*CA.CUMGDD3))), (1/(1-1.0169))),4) ELSE 0 END AS Pmaxacc

FROM Cleansed CD
LEFT JOIN CUMData CA ON CD.Date = CA.Date AND CD.Location = CA.Location
) as Final) Final2
ORDER BY Final2.Date, Final2.Location
